channel.title: Ipod
channel.description: My Ipod's been acting up lately as well. I conected it to my laptop so it could charge and I leave my room only to come back and find that my laptop has the blue screen of death. So I disconnect my Ipod, and now it glitches all the time, like the backlight flashes randomly and songs will cut off and switch at random too.

item.title: Ipod
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

I’ve had my 1st gen ipod nano since 05 (when they came out) and that works well but the shuffle feature seems to have stopped working :\

Read full topic

item.title: Ipod
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

On another topic

How old is it? I’ve had mine for a year or so and it sometimes acts strangely. Like freezing, not turning off, not turning on, playing through all the tracks automatically skipping each one until it burns out etc.

I’ve had it since December. The only other problem I had with it was that it thrown into a pool and didn’t work for two month but eventually started working again fine because it dried out.

Read full topic

item.title: Ipod
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

Get a Zune. They’re nice :]

I got 6 from this site called http://www.club.live.com, it’s a promotion site for Windows Live. You just play games and earn points. You used to be able to cheat though, which is how I made some nice cash ;]

You can still play legit though, and get a Zune no problem.

Read full topic

My IPOD touch needs to be hit harder now a days to press some buttons.
But Blue screen of death (Lol’d)
